00036   RunTimeProcessor::RunTimeProcessor()
00037     :    marlin::Processor("RunTimeProcessor"),
00038          _beginOfRunFetched(false)
00039   {
00040 
00041 
00042     registerProcessorParameter( "RunTimeCollectionName" , 
00043                                "The folder in which we will store the run time info" ,
00044                                _colRuntime ,
00045                                 std::string( "/cd_calice/" + std::string(COL_RUNTIME_INFO) ) );
00046 
00047     registerProcessorParameter( "RunTimeCollectionName" , 
00048                                "The folder in which we will store the run time info" ,
00049                                _colRuntime ,
00050                                 std::string( COL_RUNTIME_INFO ) );
00051 
00052      registerProcessorParameter( "DBInit" ,
00053                                 "Initialization string for conditions database"  ,
00054                                 _dbinit ,
00055                                 std::string("localhost:CaliceCondDB:user:password")) ;
00056 
00057 
00058   }

00089   void RunTimeProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent * evtP ) 
00090   {
00091     _runnum = evtP->getRunNumber();
00092 
00093     if(!_beginOfRunFetched) _beginofrun =  evtP->getTimeStamp();
00094     _beginOfRunFetched=true;
00095 
00096     _endofrun = evtP->getTimeStamp();
00097   }
00098 
00099   /*****************************************************/
00100   
00101   
00102   
00103   /*****************************************************/
00104 
00105   void RunTimeProcessor::end() 
00106   {
00107     //Check if start and stop are different if not add more to stop to avoid start == stop
00108     if(_beginofrun == _endofrun)
00109       _flag = true;
00110 
00111     //#ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00112     LCTime beginofrun( _beginofrun);
00113     LCTime endofrun( _endofrun);
00114 
00115     if(_flag)
00116       {
00117         std::cout << "Same start & end run timestamps -- adding 20 mins to the timestamp" << std::endl;
00118         endofrun += (long64)(20*60)*1000000000; //add 20 mins to the end run
00119         _endofrun += (long64)(20*60)*1000000000;
00120       }
00121 
00122     //#endif
00123     std::cout << "Run Start of Run " << _runnum << " is: " << beginofrun.getDateString() << std::endl;
00124     std::cout << "Run End of Run " << _runnum << " is: " << endofrun.getDateString() << std::endl;
00125 
00126      //The LCIO collection which will be written to the db
00127      LCCollectionVec* col_runtimeinfo = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT ) ;
00128 
00129 
00130     //create a new runtime info object
00131     RunTimeInfo* runtimeinfo = new RunTimeInfo() ;
00132     runtimeinfo->setRunStartTime(_beginofrun);
00133     runtimeinfo->setRunStopTime(_endofrun);
00134 
00135 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00136     runtimeinfo->print(std::cout);
00137 #endif
00138     //add it to the collection
00139     col_runtimeinfo->addElement( runtimeinfo ) ;
00140 
00141 
00142     //write the runtime info object into the database
00143     lccd::DBInterface db(_dbinit, _colRuntime , true ) ;
00144     //db.storeCollection(static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(_runnum),lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(_runnum+1),runtimeinfo, "");
00145     //std::cout << "Before Storing Collection: " << std::endl;
00146     db.storeCollection(static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(_runnum),static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(_runnum+1),col_runtimeinfo, "");
00147   }
